metadata.title: SSP Shoaib inspects PS Kohsar, orders improved citizen services

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Feb 18 (APP):Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP) Operations Muhammad Shoaib Khan paid a surprise visit to Kohsar police station on Tuesday. A public relations officer told APP that SSP Operations inspected the records, front desk, record room, lockup, investigation officers' rooms, and residential barracks during the visit.SSP Shoaib emphasized that inappropriate behavior toward citizens would not be tolerated under any circumstances. He directed police officials to utilize all available resources for public convenience."Effective steps should be taken immediately for the prevention of serious crimes, apprehension of accused persons, and recovery of stolen goods," he added.SSP Shoaib asserted that no effort would be spared in providing relief to citizens, stressing that the protection of life and property remains a top priority for Islamabad Police.
